summary.name: summary
summary.value: unwanted Label decorator gets added when creating Form from Config object

description.name: description

value.body:
This is not the exptected behaviour.
When you manually declare a set of decorators on your form element, the usual behaviour is to automatically disable default decorators. 
For example when you use $element->setDecorators(array(...)), you don't get any default decorators added.

Kai,
Thanks for you proposal, I guess it would do the trick. On the other hand, wouldn't it be more appropriate just not to go through the loadDefaultDecorators method when decorators have been defined ?
Patch applied to trunk (25108) and release-1.12 (25109)
